title: SEO Blog App
description: Built a full-stack (Next.js/React) SEO-friendly blog application using Next.js, React, Node.js, and Express. Features include create/delete/view blogs, JWT auth, EmailGrid integration, and related posts. Fully optimized with SSR and dynamic routing.

title: News Beast
description: A news app where you can search for news from different sources and read them. You can filter the news by category and date.

title: Chat Application
description: Chat application using React, Socket.io, and Express.js, enabling seamless real-time communication. Implemented a room-based chatting system, allowing users to join specific chat rooms and interact in a private group.

title: IMDb Clone
description: Developed an IMDb clone using React to demonstrate proficiency in front-end development, state management, and API integration. This responsive web app allows users to browse, search, and view information about movies, similar to IMDb.
